item.title: [BHS/RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA notification
item.description:
Oct 21, 07:42 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 21, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 18, 20:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our NAS HA offer.

Start time : 21/10/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 21/10/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to close active NAS HA offers (0,3TB / 0,6TB / 1,2TB /2,4TB / 3,6TB / 7,2TB / 13,2TB / 19,4TB / 26,4TB).

This service closure notification concerns RBX (Roubaix, France), SBG (Strasbourg, France), and BHS (Beauharnois, Canada) locations only.
Affected customers were notified directly.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G115B23
item.description:
Oct 20, 17:35 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 20/10/2024 16:59 UTC
End time : 20/10/2024 17:33 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Oct 20, 17:23 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the "Availability/Functionality/Latency".

We are actively working to resolve this problem.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 20/10/2024 16:59 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack G115B23 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams is working to fix the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
